leaflet.candidateName: Ross Finnie, Eileen McCartin, Gordon Macdonald

messages.title: 3 reasons to vote for the Scottish Liberal Democrats
messages.content:
Jobs - We will provide the skills our economy needs by bringing together colleges and local businesses, with the resources to step in where the banks have failed.
Education - We want to raise standards in schools by letting teachers spend more time in the classroom teaching your children, not filling out Government paperwork.
Crime - We will keep your police local - no national police force! We will make offenders pay back the community for the damage they have done to our neighbourhoods.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Provide the skills our economy needs by bringing together colleges and local businesses, with the resources to step in where the banks have failed.
Raise standards in schools by allowing teachers to spend more time teaching and less on paperwork.
Keep police local with no national police force and make offenders pay back the community.

mentions.candidate: Ross Finnie, Eileen McCartin, Gordon Macdonald
mentions.tacticalSituation: Voting for Labour on the regional list is a wasted vote. 91,725 people voted Labour on the list, but they won no additional seats. Don't waste your vote again! You can help the Liberal Democrats win seats on the regional list by voting for them on the peach-coloured part of your ballot paper.

issues.economy: Provide the skills our economy needs by bringing together colleges and local businesses.
issues.education: Raise standards in schools by allowing teachers to spend more time teaching and less on paperwork.

images.caption: Scottish Liberal Democrats - Getting Scotland working
